description.value:
The visages of beasts are carved into the painted wood of a beast staff, with a large head on top. When used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 greater striking staff. While wielding the staff while you have it prepared, you're affected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Speak with Animals]. If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Animal Empathy], you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on checks using it.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gouging Claw]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Body], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pest Form]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enlarge]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Insect Form]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bestial Curse], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Insect Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pest Form]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Insect Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Moon Frenzy]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cursed Metamorphosis], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Moon Frenzy]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
